name: Stay Away! (jordanb84)
description:
Push enemies away to keep your ship's core stable! Made for Ludum Dare 49 by myself (programming/music/sfx) and cats#7175 (art).

-

HOW TO PLAY

Your goal is to beat all waves of enemies and prevent enemies from getting to the ship's core (in the center of the map) - if they hit the core, your ship's stability will go down (and you lose if it hits 0% stability).

* WASD or Arrows to move.

* Walk into enemies to push them away and hurt them!

* Bombs and coins are dropped randomly by enemies

* F or SPACE to use a bomb - great for killing a lot of nearby enemies at once (available bomb count displayed on the bottom left).

* Use coins to buy turrets from the shop on the bottom right - when you buy a turret, move your mouse over to the area of the map where you'd like to place it, then left click.

* Use coins to buy the "Magnet" upgrade - this automatically grabs nearby coins and bombs so you collect them quicker

Other Info

Written with Java/LibGDX. Requires Java to run.
